resources.string:
Jigsaw is a PUZ game. In the game, you can control 7 blocks to form a beautiful picture.

 ••press "▲" or "2", move block up.

 ••press "▼" or "8", move block down.

 ••press "◀" or "4", move block left.

 ••press "▶" or "6", move block right.

 ••press "CENTER" or "5", focus on other block.

 ••press "1", rotate counterclockwise.

 ••press "3", rotate clockwise.
